content.query:
-- syn-asa-saleconsolidated-20210201091244-Best:1
-- DROP PROCEDURE [wwi].[ForecastProductQuantity2]
CREATE PROC [wwi].[ForecastProductQuantity2] AS
BEGIN

SELECT
    CAST([ProductId] AS [bigint]) AS [ProductId],
    CAST([TransactionDate] AS [bigint]) AS [TransactionDate],
    CAST([Hour] AS [bigint]) AS [Hour]
INTO #ProductQuantityForecast2
FROM [wwi].[ProductQuantityForecast2]
WHERE TotalQuantity = 0;

SELECT
    ProductId
    ,TransactionDate
    ,Hour
    ,CAST(variable_out1 as INT) as TotalQuantity
INTO
    #Pred
FROM PREDICT (MODEL = (SELECT [model] FROM wwi.Model_PQ2 WHERE [ID] = 'syn-asa-saleconsolidated-20210201091244-Best:1'),
            DATA = #ProductQuantityForecast2,
            RUNTIME = ONNX) WITH ([variable_out1] [real])

MERGE [wwi].[ProductQuantityForecast2] AS target  
    USING (select * from #Pred) AS source (ProductId, TransactionDate, Hour, TotalQuantity)  
ON (target.ProductId = source.ProductId and target.TransactionDate = source.TransactionDate and target.Hour = source.Hour)  
    WHEN MATCHED THEN
        UPDATE SET target.TotalQuantity = source.TotalQuantity;
END
GO

/* ready to perform the forecast on the TotalQuantity column */ 
EXEC
    wwi.ForecastProductQuantity2

SELECT  
    *
FROM
    wwi.ProductQuantityForecast2
